mapper.sql: id, city_code, service_type_id, tag_price, tag_desc, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT t1.tag_name as name, t.price FROM ( SELECT tag_price AS price,tag_id FROM tbl_tag_rule_info WHERE status=1 and service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId} and city_code = #{cityCode} and find_in_set (tag_id,#{tagId}) ) t JOIN tbl_tag_info t1 ON t.tag_id = t1.id where t1.status=1;
